meanings.sent2: The unexpected news deranges her thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The silly hat deranges his sense of style.
meanings.sent4: The confusing maze deranges his sense of direction.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence deranges her sense of security.

meanings.definition: Disrupt the normal operation or function of (something).
meanings.sent1: The power outage deranges the schedule.
meanings.sent2: The storm deranges the peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat deranges the neatly arranged papers.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected visitor deranges the usual routine.
meanings.sent5: The broken clock deranges the sense of time.
